name: Halpbot
description:
A custom discord bot built in Java using JDA and my custom command framework, Halpbot-Core. One of the main functionalities of this bot was to act as a quiz bot, allowing users to quiz themselves on Chemmat121 questions as a way help remember the vast content covered in this part 1 engineering course. The quiz functionality in this bot included a vast range of questions, answer streaks, user statistics, leaderboards and helpful explanations. From feedback gained by my peers, users found the bot to be an extremely useful studying mechanism and the addition of streaks appealed to peoples competitve sides!

As of November 2021, there were:
  • 131 unique questions
  • 115 unique users
  • 1256 quizzes started
  • 5088 questions answered
